doc.field: Newberry AK historic boundaries: Historical County Boundaries from the Newberry Library Collection

This collection (stacked series) of datasets is provided to the UVA Library’s Scholars’ Lab by The Newberry Library in Chicago. These datasets are of historical county boundaries and document changes in size, shape, name and location of territories and states, dating back to the first county in the 17th Century. This collection includes all 50 states and the District of Columbia. Supplemental text resources, including chronologies, bibliographic information and for some states, commentary, and can be found at The Newberry Library’s website.
* // * The temporal extent of the datasets in the data stack is from 1634 through December 31, 2000.
* // * Datasets/Layers included in this datastack: * Alabama * Alaska * Arizona * Arkansas * California * Colorado * Connecticut * Dakota Territory * Delaware * District of Columbia * Florida * Georgia * Hawaii * Idaho * Illinois * Indiana * Iowa * Kansas * Kentucky * Louisiana * Maine * Maryland * Massachusetts * Michigan * Minnesota * Mississippi * Missouri * Montana * Nebraska * Nevada * New Hampshire * New Jersey * New Mexico * New York * North Carolina * North Dakota * Vermont * Ohio * Oklahoma * Oregon * Pennsylvania * Rhode Island * South Carolina * South Dakota * Tennessee * Texas * Utah * Virginia * Washington * West Virginia * Wisconsin * Wyoming * // * The Newberry Library is the copyright holder.
